downloadTitle: Creating custom validation rules for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Learn how to extend the diagram validation feature in Visio Premium 2010, by creating your own validation rules and including your validation rules in a custom solution.

downloadFile.name: Creating Custom Validation Rules for Visio 2010.docx

detailsSection: Learn how to extend the diagram validation feature in Microsoft Visio Premium 2010. This white paper discusses how to create your own validation rules and include your validation rules in a custom solution. For example, you could build rules to check that network diagrams include mandatory components, that process diagrams comply with company policies, or that workflows in Microsoft SharePoint Workflow diagrams are structured correctly.
detailsSection_file_name: Creating Custom Validation Rules for Visio 2010.docx
installInstructionSection: Click Download to view and save the document to your computer.
